resources.string: Anime of a boy who wants to be Hokage and trains to be, although there are many stones in the way
Luffy anime where he wants to get the One piece, which is a treasure that no one has achieved, and be the king of pirates
Goku wants to be the strongest being, and for this, he has to face multiple enemies
Tnajiro Kamado goes to sell coal to the city and when he returns something horrible happens that forces him to change his lifestyle
The story revolves around the student Yūji Itadori, who joins a secret organization of sorcerers to kill a powerful curse called Ryōmen Sukuna after becoming its host.
When a Japanese student comes into possession of a mystical notebook, he discovers that he has the ability to kill anyone whose name he writes on the notebook.
